item.title: $ whois hmussana
item.description: Hi! I’m Hassan, a Security Professional with super-paranoid instincts; a software engineer by education, a DevSecOps advocate, a lover of turn-based & real-time strategy games, a chai lover, a cook, and a history buff. Ever since I worked on my first incident in AWS environment, I’ve been fascinated by Cloud tech in general and AWS in specific. I’ve been working as a Cloud Security SME for a while now and sharpening my Cloud-Native security axe these days.
